snippet.title: Akhra: The Treasures
snippet.description:
http://www.game-remakes.com/game.php?id=2257
Go on a journey into the fantastic world of Akhra! Construct and use the ancient, powerful artifacts in order to find all of the hidden treasures. Earn powerful skills you can use to solve the puzzles. Enjoy the peaceful music and relaxing atmosphere in this Match 3 game.
